item.title: Several Wall Street analysts are saying to buy the dip in this entertainment stock
item.description: Analysts say live entertainment — concerts and shows — is less cyclical and specialized compared to other types of discretionary consumer spending.

item.title: FedEx downgraded at Loop Capital, which calls it a 'really bad recession stock'
item.description: Analyst Rick Paterson downgraded FedEx to sell from hold and cut his estimates after the shipper lowered its own outlook for the May fiscal year.

item.title: Where Wall Street analysts are finding discounts today
item.description: While stocks have steadied after the market sell-off that began in February, the S&P 500 remains 8% down from its all-time high and the Nasdaq by more...

item.title: JPMorgan upgrades Super Micro to hold rating on Nvidia Blackwell chip ramp
item.description: Analyst Samik Chatterjee upgraded Super Micro shares to neutral from underweight and lifted his price target by $10 to $45.

item.title: Goldman upgrades this conglomerate, sees 20% upside
item.description: Danaher shares are finally trading at a more attractive valuation, according to Goldman Sachs.
